description: Detects usage of the netsh command to open and allow connections to port 3389 (RDP). As seen used by Sarwent Malware
author: Sander Wiebing
name: RDP Connection Allowed Via Netsh.EXE
query: (((process.executable.text:"*\\netsh.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"netsh.exe")) AND (process.command_line.text:"*firewall\ *" AND process.command_line.text:"*add\ *" AND process.command_line.text:"*tcp\ *" AND process.command_line.text:"*3389*") AND ((process.command_line.text:"*portopening*") OR ((process.command_line.text:"*advfirewall*" AND process.command_line.text:"*rule*" AND process.command_line.text:"*allow*"))))
